April 6, 2019 D North American Championships (Third Section)
North American Championships (Third Section) 30 Set Test and Own Choice North American Championships north-american-championships-3rd-section
United States of America
Third
Chorale and Toccata
Embassy Theatre, Fort Wayne, Indiana, USA Programme of between 17 and 30 minutes, including Set Work.
The overall score is weighted as 60% of Set Piece score plus 40% of Own Choice score
1st tiebreaker - band with the highest Set Work score wins 2nd tiebreaker - band rated higher on the Set Work by 2 of the 3 adjudicators wins
April 7, 2019, 12:58 p.m. Dec. 5, 2019, 2:27 p.m.
